Posts.Content:
Posting on this site too. Just had a friend starting Taxol and is already getting side effects of aching. In other suggestions welcome.
Has anyone done this - taking Claritan before chemo and/or Neulasta - heard about
 it, tried it, know anything about
 it...?
We received this information from a nurse who had been battling breast cancer, than later from one of my husband's chemo nurses near the end of his Taxotere infusions. Also came up with another breast cancer fighter at a talk at the Wellness Center; however, the chemo nurse talking had not heard of it. He has been using it with the Jevtana (Cabazitaxel). His flu like aches have been diminished greatly to near zero.
Some of you well connected to experts might know more, but it's more in the palliative care area; which technically what all this journey is for us now.
Husband dx 49 PSA 4 full prostectemy, 1996
5+ years later radiation,
Study promenade PSA rise.
 7+ years later started Lupron
9/12 pathological arm break, bone metastasis, tumors. Study For Custersen. Control on Taxotere 9 treatments until 4/12 PSA 5.2. 
Zytiga -no se but PSA up to 57 - 5/12 to 7/12
Jevtana 8/12 now 3 treatments PSA 42. Se minimal fatigue, chemo brain. Age now 66.
Posts.Title: Claritan before chemo and/or Neulasta or other recommendations

Posts.Content:
We think its helped and have had others say it helped, but then many seem to know nothing about
 it.
